question: Venu Madhav, who passed away recently, was the noted actor of which regional cinema?
explanation: Venu Madhav (51), the well-known Telugu comedian and actor, has passed away in Secunderabad on  25th September 2019. He started as a mimicry artiste and forayed into movies. His filmography had over 170 movies in Telugu. Other than Telugu films, he even acted a few Tamil films. The 2016 film “Dr Paramanandaiah\'s Students Gang”  remains his last release.
